Package interfaces

Interface InGameInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AiController, InGameController
    public interface InGameInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean askForBet​(int bet, Player lastBet)
      supposed to ask the Player if he wants to go with the bet or if he wants to pass like "18 or pass?"
      int askToPlayCard​(int timeToPlay, PlayState ps)
      asks the player to play a card.
      void askToRekontra()
      should give the player the option to announce rekontra.
      PlayState askToSetPlayState​(PlayState ps)
      relevant for the ai and the ui, returns the changed PlayState after the Player won the auction.
      boolean askToTakeUpSkat()
      asks the player if he wants to take up the skat.
      void itsYourTurn()
      only relevant for the ui, tells the player he's supposed to play a card, used before askToPlayCard.
      void openAskForBet​(int bet)
      only relevant for the ui.
      void openAuctionWinnerScreen()
      only relevant for the ui.
      void openSwitchSkat​(PlayState ps)
      only relevant for the ui.
      void openTakeUpSkat()
      only relevant for the ui.
      void receivedNewBet​(int bet, Player player)
      updates the last bet (you don't need to be part of the conversation).
      void receivedNewCard​(Card card, Player player)
      updates the current trick with the last played card and the Player, who played it.
      void setGameSettings​(GameSettings gs)
      sets the gameSettings, before game starts.
      void setPlaySettingsAfterAuction​(PlayState ps)
      especially for the ai to know which PlayMode is played.
      void showOpen​(Player player)
      should show the cards of the given player, who plays open.
      void showPossibleCards​(java.util.List<Card> cards)
      Example: Clubs-Jack, Spades-Jack, Clubs-10, Clubs-8, Hearts-7, Diamonds-9 Playable: Trump (Jack + Clubs) Return Array: (null, null, null, null, Hearts-7, Diamonds-9).
      void showScore​(java.util.List<Player> player)
      shows the points of all players.
      void showWinnerTrick​(Player player)
      especially important for ai, shows trick winner.
      void startPlay​(java.util.List<Card> hand, Position position)
      should open the InGameScreen and show the Player his cards and his position.
      void stopGame​(java.lang.String reason)
      stops the game and tells why.
      java.util.List<Card> switchSkat​(PlayState ps)
      relevant for the ai and the ui, returns the two cards so lay on the declarers stack, only if askToTakeUpSkat returns true.
      void updateHand​(java.util.List<Card> list)
      should reload the hand cards in the given order.

        boolean askForBet​(int bet,
                  Player lastBet)
        supposed to ask the Player if he wants to go with the bet or if he wants to pass like "18 or pass?" (if bet=18).
        Parameters:
        bet - the player bet

      • receivedNewBet

        player - who bet

      • updateHand

        Parameters:

        player - who played it
